httpdocs
Table of Contents

PostAccountsAccountPeople

Creates a new person.

HTTP Request

POST \v1\accounts\{account}\people HTTP/1.1

host: api.stripe.com:443
eTag: "23423432"
accept: application/json
content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded


{ "example": "Example goes here" }

Parameters

account [ in: path type: string ]
required

Request Body Schema

{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "address": {
      "title": "address_specs",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "city": {
          "maxLength": 100,
          "type": "string"
        },
        "country": {
          "maxLength": 5000,
          "type": "string"
        },
        "line1": {
          "maxLength": 200,
          "type": "string"
        },
        "line2": {
          "maxLength": 200,
          "type": "string"
        },
        "postal_code": {
          "maxLength": 5000,

      "type": "string",
      "description": "The person's email address."

    "expand": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "maxLength": 5000,
        "type": "string"
      },
      "description": "Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded."
    },

      "maxLength": 5000,

          "enum": [
            ""

      "type": "string",

    },
    "id_number": {
      "maxLength": 5000,
      "type": "string",
      "description": "The person's ID number, as appropriate for their country. For example, a social security number in the U.S., social insurance number in Canada, etc. Instead of the number itself, you can also provide a PII token provided by Stripe.js."
    },
    "id_number_secondary": {
      "maxLength": 5000,
      "type": "string",
      "description": "The person's secondary ID number, as appropriate for their country, will be used for enhanced verification checks. In Thailand, this would be the laser code found on the back of an ID card. Instead of the number itself, you can also provide a PII token provided by Stripe.js."
    },
    "last_name": {
      "maxLength": 5000,

    },
    "metadata": {
      "anyOf": [
        {
          "type": "object",

            "type": "string"

          "enum": [
            ""

    },
    "nationality": {
      "maxLength": 5000,
      "type": "string",
      "description": "The country where the person is a national. Two-letter country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2), or &quot;XX&quot; if unavailable."
    },
    "person_token": {
      "maxLength": 5000,
      "type": "string",
      "description": "A person token, used to securely provide details to the person."
    },
    "phone": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "The person's phone number."
    },
    "political_exposure": {
      "maxLength": 5000,
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Indicates if the person or any of their representatives, family members, or other closely related persons, declares that they hold or have held an important public job or function, in any jurisdiction."
    },
    "registered_address": {
      "title": "address_specs",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "city": {
          "maxLength": 100,
          "type": "string"
        },

          "maxLength": 5000,
          "type": "string"
        },
        "state": {
          "maxLength": 5000,
          "type": "string"
        }
      },
      "description": "The person's registered address."
    },
    "relationship": {
      "title": "relationship_specs",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "director": {
          "type": "boolean"
        },
        "executive": {
          "type": "boolean"
        },
        "owner": {
          "type": "boolean"
        },
        "percent_ownership": {
          "anyOf": [
            {
              "type": "number"
            },
            {
              "enum": [
                ""
              ],
              "type": "string"
            }
          ]
        },
        "representative": {
          "type": "boolean"
        },
        "title": {
          "maxLength": 5000,
          "type": "string"
        }
      },
      "description": "The relationship that this person has with the account's legal entity."
    },
    "ssn_last_4": {
      "type": "string",
      "description": "The last four digits of the person's Social Security number (U.S. only)."
    },
    "verification": {
      "title": "person_verification_specs",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "additional_document": {
          "title": "person_verification_document_specs",

          "properties": {
            "back": {

        "document": {
          "title": "person_verification_document_specs",

          "properties": {
            "back": {
              "maxLength": 500,

            },
            "front": {
              "maxLength": 500,
              "type": "string"
            }
          }
        }
      },
      "description": "The person's verification status."
    }
  },
  "additionalProperties": false
